Sentencas: Solid oxide fuel cell system is a energy conversion device with the advantages of low emissions, high efficiency and long life.
Titulo: Root cause analysis and diagnosis of solid oxide fuel cell system oscillations based on data and topology-based model

Sentencas: However, the occurrence and propagation of oscillations are common in a system.
Titulo: Root cause analysis and diagnosis of solid oxide fuel cell system oscillations based on data and topology-based model

Sentencas: When certain variables oscillate, the lifetime of system is significantly reduced and the output electrical characteristics are affected.
Titulo: Root cause analysis and diagnosis of solid oxide fuel cell system oscillations based on data and topology-based model

Sentencas: Therefore, it is important to analyze and diagnose the root cause of solid oxide fuel cell system oscillations to prevent the propagation of the oscillations.
Titulo: Root cause analysis and diagnosis of solid oxide fuel cell system oscillations based on data and topology-based model

Sentencas: An independent solid oxide fuel cell system consists of multiple subsystems, and each subsystem consists of multiple process variables.
Titulo: Root cause analysis and diagnosis of solid oxide fuel cell system oscillations based on data and topology-based model

Sentencas: It is not easy to locate the root cause of the oscillations accurately.
Titulo: Root cause analysis and diagnosis of solid oxide fuel cell system oscillations based on data and topology-based model

Sentencas: A combination of data-driven causality and topology-based model is adopted in this paper, which provides a complete procedure for diagnosing system oscillations.
Titulo: Root cause analysis and diagnosis of solid oxide fuel cell system oscillations based on data and topology-based model

Sentencas: First, the method of combining principal component analysis and oscillation significance index is chosen to select feature variables.
Titulo: Root cause analysis and diagnosis of solid oxide fuel cell system oscillations based on data and topology-based model

Sentencas: Then the data-driven Granger causality analysis is applied to provide reliable diagnosis of oscillation source.
Titulo: Root cause analysis and diagnosis of solid oxide fuel cell system oscillations based on data and topology-based model

Sentencas: Finally, the diagnosis result is further enhanced by topology-based model which takes process connectivity and knowledge into account.
Titulo: Root cause analysis and diagnosis of solid oxide fuel cell system oscillations based on data and topology-based model

Sentencas: Through analysis and system experiment, the source of oscillations Feed CH4 PV is successfully found.
Titulo: Root cause analysis and diagnosis of solid oxide fuel cell system oscillations based on data and topology-based model

Sentencas: The result shows that the method based on the combination of data and topology model can accurately locate the root cause of oscillations.
Titulo: Root cause analysis and diagnosis of solid oxide fuel cell system oscillations based on data and topology-based model
